title: How long should liquidity mining program last?
body:
This proposal is to gauge the desired timeframe liquidity mining should last,which rewards lp providers on uniswap and sushiswap with RLR.

Note that longer the timeframe lesser the reward per block and vice-versa
author: 0xAa9E20bAb58d013220D632874e9Fe44F8F971e4d
